text: Consider the following decision problems: (Pl) : Does a given finite state machine accept a given string? (P2) : Does a given context free grammar generate an infinite number of strings? Which of the following statements is true? A. Both(P1) and (P2) are decidable B. Neither (P1) nor (P2) is decidable C. Only (P1) is decidable D. Only (P2) is decidable gatecse-2000 theory-of-computation decidability normal
